entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
